# TypeMaster Pro - Advanced Typing Practice Platform

![TypeMaster Pro](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

## üöÄ Overview

TypeMaster Pro is a modern typing practice platform designed to help users enhance their typing speed and accuracy through interactive exercises and real-time feedback.

## ‚ú® Key Features

- üìä Real-time WPM (Words Per Minute) tracking
- üéØ Accuracy measurement and analysis
- üåà Multiple practice modes
- üìà Progress tracking dashboard
- üé® Customizable themes
- üíæ Progress auto-save
- üì± Responsive design

## üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

- React 18
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Node.js
- Express.js
- MongoDB

## üöÄ Getting Started

### Prerequisites

```bash
node -v  # Requires Node.js 14+
npm -v   # Requires npm 6+
```

### Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/legendxdevil/typemaster-pro.git
cd typemaster-pro
npm install
npm run dev
```

## üìù Usage

1. Visit `http://localhost:3000`
2. Select your preferred practice mode
3. Start typing and track your progress
4. View statistics in the dashboard

## üìä Features Details

### Practice Modes
- Basic Training
- Advanced Exercises
- Code Snippets
- Speed Tests
- Custom Text

### Statistics
- WPM History
- Accuracy Trends
- Practice Time
- Improvement Graph
